nodes.text: The Maladi system was a star system that was located within the Maladi sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Expansion Region and the Slice. The system shared its name with the cult of assassins known as the Maladians.
The Maladi system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square O-12.
